text: walamaa ndm aladhin ebdu aleijl min dun allah eind rjwe musaa 'ilyhm, wara'awa 'anahum qad dllu ean qasad alsbyl, wdhhbu ean din allh, 'ukhidhuu fi al'iqrar balebwdyt walastghfar, fqalu: layin lam yarhamna rabuna bqabwl twbtna, wystr biha dhnwbna, lanakunana min alhalikin aladhin dhahabat aemalhm
